fuzzycontroller.membership package#

Modules#

fuzzycontroller.membership.membership_functions#

class fuzzycontroller.membership.membership_functions.GauAngleMF(universe: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], params: list, start: float, end: float)#

Bases: MembershipFunction

A GauAngle Membership Function

This is a essentially a Gaussian Membership function, but with its values set to 0 outside of some interval

property mf#

The membership function

nonsingleton_interp_mem(input_mf: ndarray, defuzz: str)#

Computes the membership value of a non-singleton fuzzy set with this class.

Parameters:

  • input_mf (np.ndarray) – The input fuzzy set to be compared to this class.

  • defuzz (string) – The defuzzification method to use. valid values are “centroid” and “similarity”.

Returns:

The membership value of input_mf in mf.

Return type:

float

singleton_interp_mem(x: float)#

Computes the membership value of a singleton fuzzy set x with this class

Parameters:

x – The value of the singleton fuzzy set.

Returns:

The membership value of x in this class.

property universe#

The universe

class fuzzycontroller.membership.membership_functions.MembershipFunction#

Bases: ABC

An abstract class for a any MembershipFunction

Contains all the common functionality for any membership function.

_universe#

a numpy array representing the universe

_mf#

a numpy array (wrapped with the skfuzzy library) representing the membership function

abstract property mf: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]]#

The membership function

nonsingleton_interp_mem(input_mf: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], defuzz: str) → float#

Computes the membership value of a non-singleton fuzzy set with this class.

Parameters:

  • input_mf (np.ndarray) – The input fuzzy set to be compared to this class.

  • defuzz (string) – The defuzzification method to use. valid values are “centroid” and “similarity”.

Returns:

The membership value of input_mf in mf.

Return type:

float

singleton_interp_mem(x) → float#

Computes the membership value of a singleton fuzzy set x with this class

Parameters:

x – The value of the singleton fuzzy set.

Returns:

The membership value of x in this class.
